languages.text: "Там кроме Йеремии еще троим жизнь не мила стала от этих воплей, а один до сих пор слюни в подушку пускает".

traits.locale_text: "Правда, правда. У меня кум в той смене был. Говорит, там окромя Еремии еще троим жизнь не мила стала от этих воплей, а один до сих пор слюни в подушку пускает".

languages.text: "His screams drove the three beside him mad. One of them's still drooling on his pillow."
languages.original_text: "Там кроме Йеремии еще троим жизнь не мила стала от этих воплей, а один до сих пор слюни в подушку пускает".

traits.locale_text: "Three others beside Jeremia hated those screams more than they liked being alive. And there's one who's still drooling on his pillow."
"Three others beside Jeremia hated those screams more than they liked being alive. And there's one who's still drooling on his pillow."
"Jeremia's screams drove the three beside him mad. One of them's still drooling on his pillow."
"Jeremia's screams drove the three beside him mad. One of them's still drooling on his pillow."
"His screams drove the three beside him mad. One of them's still drooling on his pillow."
"His screams drove the three beside him mad. One of them's still drooling on his pillow."

languages.text: «Sus gritos hicieron enloquecer a los tres que tenía al lado. Uno de ellos sigue babeando en la almohada».
languages.original_text: "His screams drove the three beside him mad. One of them's still drooling on his pillow."

traits.locale_text: «Sus gritos hicieron enloquecer a los tres que tenía al lado. Uno de ellos sigue babeando en la almohada».

languages.text: 「彼の悲鳴で、そばにいた3名が狂ってしまいました。そのうちひとりは、いまでも枕元でよだれを垂れ流しています」
languages.original_text: "His screams drove the three beside him mad. One of them's still drooling on his pillow."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の悲鳴で、そばにいた3名が狂ってしまいました。そのうちひとりは、いまでも枕元でよだれを垂れ流しています」

languages.text: “他的尖叫声让周围三个人都发了疯，其中有一个到现在还躺在床上流口水呢。”
languages.original_text: "His screams drove the three beside him mad. One of them's still drooling on his pillow."

traits.locale_text: “他的尖叫声让周围三个人都发了疯，其中有一个到现在还躺在床上流口水呢。”

languages.text: "Seine Schreie haben die drei neben ihm in den Wahnsinn getrieben. Einer von ihnen sabbert noch immer auf sein Kissen."
languages.original_text: "His screams drove the three beside him mad. One of them's still drooling on his pillow."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Schreie haben die drei neben ihm in den Wahnsinn getrieben. Einer von ihnen sabbert noch immer auf sein Kissen."

languages.text: « Ses cris ont complètement perturbé trois de ses camarades. D'ailleurs, l'un d'entre eux est encore cloué au lit, à baver sur son oreiller. »
languages.original_text: "His screams drove the three beside him mad. One of them's still drooling on his pillow."

traits.locale_text: « Ses cris ont complètement perturbé trois de ses camarades. D'ailleurs, l'un d'entre eux est encore cloué au lit, à baver sur son oreiller. »

languages.text: "Çığlıklarıyla kendisi dışında üç kişiyi daha delirtmiş. Bir tanesi hâlâ yastığına salyalarını akıtarak yatıyor."
languages.original_text: "His screams drove the three beside him mad. One of them's still drooling on his pillow."
